sn51.32:1.3: katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgato evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo”ti?
sn51.32:2.2: “catunnaṃ kho, bhikkhave, iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgato evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo.
sn51.32:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti—
sn51.32:3.3: iti me chando na ca atilīno bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.32:3.5: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.32:3.6: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.32:3.7: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.32:3.8: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.32:3.12: iti me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā bhavissati, na ca atipaggahitā bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittā bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati.
sn51.32:3.14: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.32:3.15: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.32:3.16: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.32:3.17: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.32:3.18: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgato evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo.
sn51.32:4.1: Imesañca pana, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgato anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vatteti.
sn51.32:4.2: Imesañca pana, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā tathāgato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
